name: Donphan
description: It has sharp, hard tusks and a rugged hide. Its TACKLE is strong enough to knock down a house.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon is at full HP, any hit that would knock it out will instead leave it with 1 HP.  Regardless of its current HP, it is also immune to the one-hit KO moves: fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold.  If this Pokémon is holding a focus sash, this ability takes precedence and the item will not be consumed.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.effect: During a sandstorm, this Pokémon has 1.25× its evasion, and it does not take sandstorm damage regardless of type.  The evasion bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in a sandstorm.
